columns.name: research_id
columns.description: UUID generated for research data set.

columns.name: browser
columns.description: Client-side browser from which the request was sent

columns.name: os
columns.description: Operating system from which the request was sent

columns.name: message_truncated
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the message text has been truncated in order to fit into Redshift.

columns.name: message_length
columns.description: Size of the message body in Unicode code units.
